entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
